params.amounts: The list of corresponding amounts to withdraw.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.to: The address of recipient on layer 1.
params.token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 2.
params.tokenIds: The list of token ids to withdraw.

params.amounts: The list of corresponding amounts to withdraw.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 2.
params.tokenIds: The list of token ids to withdraw.

params._counterpart: The address of `L1ERC1155Gateway` contract in L1.
params._messenger: The address of `L2ScrollMessenger` contract in L2.

finalizeBatchDepositERC1155(address,addr.details: Requirements:  - The function should only be called by L2ScrollMessenger.  - The function should also only be called by L1ERC1155Gateway on layer 1.

params.amounts: The list of corresponding amounts to deposit.
params.from: The address of account who deposits the token on layer 1.
params.l1Token: The address of corresponding layer 1 token.
params.l2Token: The address of corresponding layer 2 token.
params.to: The address of recipient on layer 2 to receive the token.
params.tokenIds: The list of token ids to deposit.

finalizeDepositERC1155(address,address,a.details: Requirements:  - The function should only be called by L2ScrollMessenger.  - The function should also only be called by L1ERC1155Gateway on layer 1.

params.amount: The amount of token to deposit.
params.from: The address of account who deposits the token on layer 1.
params.l1Token: The address of corresponding layer 1 token.
params.l2Token: The address of corresponding layer 2 token.
params.to: The address of recipient on layer 2 to receive the token.

initialize(address,address).details: The parameters `_counterpart` and `_messenger` are no longer used.

params._counterpart: The address of `L1ERC1155Gateway` contract in L1.
params._messenger: The address of `L2ScrollMessenger` contract in L2.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._l1Token: The address of ERC1155 token on layer 1.
params._l2Token: The address of corresponding ERC1155 token on layer 2.

params.amount: The amount of token to withdraw.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.to: The address of recipient on layer 1.
params.token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 2.

params.amount: The amount of token to withdraw.
params.gasLimit: Unused, but included for potential forward compatibility considerations.
params.token: The address of ERC1155 NFT on layer 2.

batchWithdrawERC1155(address,address,uin.notice: Batch withdraw a list of ERC1155 NFT to caller's account on layer 1.

batchWithdrawERC1155(address,uint256[],u.notice: Batch withdraw a list of ERC1155 NFT to caller's account on layer 1.

counterpart().notice: The address of corresponding L1/L2 Gateway contract.

finalizeBatchDepositERC1155(address,addr.notice: Complete ERC1155 deposit from layer 1 to layer 2 and send NFT to recipient's account on layer 2.

finalizeDepositERC1155(address,address,a.notice: Complete ERC1155 deposit from layer 1 to layer 2 and send NFT to recipient's account on layer 2.

messenger().notice: The address of corresponding L1ScrollMessenger/L2ScrollMessenger contract.

tokenMapping(address).notice: Mapping from layer 2 token address to layer 1 token address for ERC1155 NFT.

updateTokenMapping(address,address).notice: Update layer 2 to layer 1 token mapping.

withdrawERC1155(address,address,uint256,.notice: Withdraw some ERC1155 NFT to caller's account on layer 1.

withdrawERC1155(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Withdraw some ERC1155 NFT to caller's account on layer 1.

documentation.text: @notice Mapping from layer 2 token address to layer 1 token address for ERC1155 NFT.
